import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Card, Typography, List, ListItem, ListItemPrefix, ListItemSuffix, Chip, } from "@material-tailwind/react"; import { PresentationChartBarIcon, ShoppingBagIcon, UserCircleIcon, Cog6ToothIcon, InboxIcon, PowerIcon, MoonIcon, SunIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; const DefaultSidebar = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(1); const setSelectedItem = (value) => setSelected(value); return (
BRRDI
{selected ==1 ? ( setSelectedItem(1)}> Dashboard ) : ( setSelectedItem(1)}> Dashboard )} {selected == 2 ? ( setSelectedItem(2)}> Profile ) : ( setSelectedItem(2)}> Profile )}

); } export default DefaultSidebar;
